description: Premium of the insured person(s). Must be set for offer and omitted during request.

netPremiumDSBMalePercentage.description: Net premium rate for daily sickness benefits for men. The net premium rate corresponds to the percentage of the net premium offered after deducting any discounts (combination discounts, payroll discounts, etc.), but without surcharges for fixed premium components. The net premium includes any final fee, brokerage fee, taxes and duties. Corresponds to the premium charged to the customer.

premiumMinimumAmount.description: Minimum premium for DSB person group in CHF
